clause.title: Net equivalent energy usage of a sole-occupancy unit of a Class 2 building or a Class 4 part of a building

clause-variation.deleted-text: J3D14 does not apply in NSW.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The net equivalent energy usage of a sole-occupancy unit of a Class 2 building or Class 4 part of a building, calculated in accordance with (a), must not exceed the allowance calculated in accordance with (b)—determined in accordance with the following formula:

ol.li:

subclause.xt:author: Jerome Samuel
subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: For the purposes of (1), the net equivalent energy usage must be calculated—

ol.xt:author: Jerome Samuel
ol.li: where the sole-occupancy unit of a Class 2 building or Class 4 part of a building is served by a dedicated heated water system, in accordance with (3); and
where the sole-occupancy unit of a Class 2 building or Class 4 part of a building is served by a centralised heated water system, in accordance with (4).

subclause.xt:author: Jerome Samuel
subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The net equivalent energy usage of a sole-occupancy unit of a Class 2 building or Class 4 part of a building served by a dedicated heated water system must be determined in accordance subclause.title: SubClause

subclause.xt:author: Jerome Samuel
subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The main space conditioning and main water heater efficiency factor for a sole-occupancy unit of a Class 2 building or Class 4 part of a building served by a centralised heated water system must be determined in accordance with the following—

ol.xt:author: Jerome Samuel
ol.li: for other than a solar boosted centralised heater water system, the equivalent water heater used to the determine the efficiency factor in the ABCB Standard for Whole-of-Home Efficiency Factors must be determined in accordance with Table J3D14e; and

for a solar boosted centralised heated water system, the efficiency factors must be determined in accordance with the following formula: E E = F 1 × P 1 + F 2 × P 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=
